short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filling in forms has never been so easy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LightFill is an innovative extension designed to streamline the process of data entry in online forms. Utilizing advanced artificial intelligence technology, LightFill automatically extracts relevant information from your documents, such as ID cards, passports or invoices, and instantly fills in form fields.

🗝️ Key features:

🤖 Automated data extraction from various types of documents
🗂️ Instant form filling with a single click
📄 Wide compatibility with multiple document and form formats
😊 User-friendly and intuitive interface
🔒 Enhanced security protocols to protect users' personal data

LightFill has been developed with the aim of saving users valuable time by eliminating the need for tedious and error-prone manual data entry. Whether you are a professional regularly dealing with administrative forms or an individual looking to streamline your online purchases, LightFill caters to all your needs.

We invite you to try LightFill now and discover how this extension can simplify your online data entry experience.
